entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 12 Aug 2023 02:01:24
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Zoom rewrites its policies to make clear that your videos aren't used to train AI tools
- I'm an AI prompt engineer. Here are 3 ways I use ChatGPT to get the best results.
- Authorization and Amazon Verified Permissions - A New Way to Manage Permissions Part IX: Hierarchies and ABAC
- This Stanford social network could be the next Facebook on college campuses‚Äîbut it has a Gen-Z twist
- There's a brewing backlash against DEI in corporate America — and a venture capital fund getting sued for racial bias is now caught in the middle

Business:
- The US housing market hits a record value of $47 trillion as the inventory shortage fuels a price boom
- From 'lazy girl jobs' to 'loud quitting,' here are the biggest workplace buzzwords of 2023 — and what they mean
- The Fed can take the rest of the year off as inflation is crumbling and there's no recession in sight, market vet Ed Yardeni says
- Zoom Wants Workers Back, Cotopaxi‚Äôs People Chief On Remote Work And WeWork‚Äôs Warning
- Buy tech stocks now as solid 2nd-quarter earnings will power a 15% rally into year-end, Wedbush says

AI:
- I'm an AI prompt engineer. Here are 3 ways I use ChatGPT to get the best results.
- Zoom rewrites its policies to make clear that your videos aren't used to train AI tools
- There's a brewing backlash against DEI in corporate America — and a venture capital fund getting sued for racial bias is now caught in the middle

Other:
- Trump was warned by a judge about making even 'ambiguous statements' that could intimidate witnesses or influence jurors in the Jan. 6 case
- Kentucky's largest school district had to cancel class for two days so it could overhaul a 'disastrous' new bus system that left kids on buses until 10 p.m.
- Lyft riders look at their app about 9 times per ride. Now they'll see ads when they check it.
- Leesa's Summer Daze mattress sale is back with up to $700 off our expert's top sleeper pick
- Apple TV's MLS Season Pass subscriptions doubled since Messi's arrival in US
- The Verge Launches ‚ÄúInstaller,‚Äù a Newsletter About the Next Big Things to Download, Watch, and Explore
- Vampire Survivors: our collective obsession with the quirky, genre-defining indie game
- TechCrunch+ Roundup: Creator economy VC survey, B2C fintech growth strategy, web3 demo day
- The MOVEit mass hacks hold a valuable lesson for the software industry
- Top 10 Flutter Side Projects that can end up becoming your next big startup project or SAAS üöÄ
- These airports have the best and worst wait times, according to actual passenger ratings
- The Week‚Äôs 10 Biggest Funding Rounds: Neuralink Connects With $270M, Biotech Goes Big Again
- Back to School sales: cheap laptops, dorm room essentials, headphones, and more
- These are the 5 most pressing questions about the bullish 'resilience' thesis of the stock market and the economy
- A Democratic House candidate said he was dropping out of the race because of a 'lack of joy.' Eight hours later, he said it was a mistake and is still in the race
- Ukrainian pilots have been taking English classes in between their missions to prepare to fly US-made jets
- There's a brewing backlash against DEI in corporate America — and a venture capital fund getting sued for racial bias is now caught in the middle
- I'm one of only 26 Black women astrophysicists in America. Acting helped me overcome the stereotypes I felt as a woman of color in STEM.

Insights:
- The US housing market is experiencing a record value due to an inventory shortage, leading to a price boom.
- The Fed believes there is no recession in sight and can take the rest of the year off as inflation is crumbling.
- Zoom is making policy changes to ensure user videos are not used to train AI tools.
- There is a growing backlash against diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) efforts in corporate America, with a venture capital fund facing a lawsuit for racial bias caught in the middle.
- The tech industry is seeing advancements in AI technology, with AI prompt engineers utilizing tools like ChatGPT for optimal results.
- The stock market is expected to rally into year-end based on solid 2nd-quarter earnings, particularly in the tech sector.
- Various industries, such as transportation and mattress sales, are experiencing changes and promotions.
- The education sector faces challenges, such as a problematic bus system and job market difficulties for recent college graduates.
- Cultural and social topics, such as indie games and the representation of underrepresented groups in STEM fields, are also discussed.
